What are you thankful for this week?: Koj ua tsaug rau lub lim tiam no yog dab tsi?
What are you struggling with and how can: Dab tsi yog koj tawm tsam nrog thiab peb tuaj yeem pab tau li cas?
How did you put into practice the script: Ua li cas koj tau muab cov ntawv dab neeg / zaj dab neeg peb tau kawm tas los peb tau ntsib?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Koj tau qhia leej twg lub lim tiam dhau los ua ke nrog thiab nws mus li cas?
What needs did you meet in the community: Koj yuav tsum tau ntsib dab tsi hauv zej tsoom zej zog?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Hais kom lwm tus nyeem kab lus ib ntu zuj zus.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Muaj ib tug tswvcuab hauv pawg qhia nws hauv lawv cov lus.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Hais kom pab pawg yog tias lawv tau ntxiv dab tsi los yog sab laug dab tsi.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Thaum koj ua tiav nrog tag nrho cov lus, nug ib tug neeg hauv pab pawg los qhia tag nrho zaj dab neeg los ntawm kev nco. Muaj pab pawg kho qhov tsis raug.
What does this passage tell us about God: Cov nqe lus no qhia peb txog Vajtswv li cas?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Cov nqe lus no qhia peb txog cov neeg li cas?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Yog tias nqe lus no muaj tseeb, peb yuav tsum hloov tus cwj pwm twg?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Koj yuav qhia zaj dab neeg no rau lub lim tiam no?
What needs can we meet in the community: Dab tsi xav tau peb tau sib ntsib hauv zej zog lub lim tiam no?
When do you want to meet again?: Thaum twg koj xav ntsib dua?
Discovry Bible Study: Kev Kawm Ntawv Kev Kawm Ntawv Vajlugkub
Would you like to discover with your fri: Koj puas xav nrhiav tau koj cov phooj ywg uas Vajtswv yog tus zoo li cas thiab qhov uas Vajtswv xav kom koj nyob?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Nov yog qee cov lus nug kom tau koj kev sib tham tau pib.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Koj puas xav nrhiav tau rau koj tus kheej uas Vajtswv yog leej twg thiab yuav ua li cas Vajtswv xav kom koj nyob?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Cov neeg feem coob nyiam ua cov kev tshawb nrhiav no hauv pab pawg nrog lawv cov phooj ywg.
